```45766d2f6c2f``` = 6 bytes

## sc rule enforcer
### data

## sov accounts
```4163636f756e74732f6163636f756e74732f204040e364c10f2bec9c1fe500a1cd4c247c89d650a01ed7e82caba867877c21``` = 50 bytes

## Bitcoin
### Sequencer Commitment
#### Commit tx
2 Segwit input + 1 Taproot Output = 190vb

#### Reveal Tx
1 taproot input
Witness Items =>
    Signature 64 bytes
    Script 209 bytes
    control block 65 bytes
    = 64 + 209 + 65 = 338 bytes
1 Taproot ouput = 31 vbytes
338 + 31 = 369 vbytes


### Batch Proof
#### Reveal tx
1.6 kb
because OP_PUSHBYTES is 2 bytes, assuming we inscribe 400kb of data 400kb / 512 bytes ~= 800
800*2 = 1600 bytes
the other non push parts is 161 bytes
1600+161 = 1761

#### Output
Full Snark Receipt except for journal is 408 bytes

1761+408 = 2169


650 + 39 + 18432 + 82 + 93 + 2169 = 21465

ethereum 10 min batch avg number of txs = 7439.137755

`21465/7439.137755 = 2.8854150`
